name: Hoop Land
summary: Get ready for tip off at center court in the latest hoops title by Koality Game! Choose a league, select a team and lead your players to the Championship. Dribble the ball up court and cross-over your opponent for the step back three. Swish! Or run a fast break offense and throw the lob to your teammate for the alley-oop. Slam dunk! Either way, you can become the next dynasty in the hottest basketball simulation game on the market. Welcome to Hoop Land.
